prerelease.comment: fix: correct aspect type for content that looks like an attribute
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: doc: add note to FASTElement.metadata API
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: when recycle is set to false while itemBinding stays the same, views should be recreated
prerelease.author: wendy.hsu@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: simplify execution context to align closer with v1
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: ergo improvements to context, array length, and metadata
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: move optional bindings out of rollup and list as exports
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix: make SyntheticViewTemplate type a string so it is generally usable
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: implement W3C WC community context protocol and integrate with DI
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `DOM` - Tree Walker methods are no longer used and are thus removed. The API for removing child nodes has been removed as well since it was only used in one place and could be inlined. The helper `createCustomAttributePlaceholder()` no longer requires an attribute name. It will be uniquely generated internally.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `class` - Bindings to `class` are now more nuanced. Binding directly to `class` will simply set the `className` property. If you need to bind to `class` knowing that manual JS will also manipulate the `classList` in addition to the binding, then you should now bind to `:classList` instead. This allows for performance optimizations in the simple, most common case.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `Behavior` and `ViewBehavior` - `Behavior` now requires an `ExecutionContext` for `unbind`. Behaviors can be used for elements or views. `ViewBehavior` has been introduced for use exclusively with views, and provides some optimization opportunities.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `RefBehavior` has been replaced with `RefDirective`. The directive also implements `ViewBehavior` allowing a single directive instance to be shared across all template instances that use the ref.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Removed `SlottedBehavior` and `ChildrenBehavior` have been replaced with `SlottedDirective` and `ChildrenDirective`. These directives allow a single directive instance to be shared across all template instances that use the ref.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Removed `AttachedBehaviorHTMLDirective` and `AttachedBehaviorType` since they are no longer used in the new directive/behavior architecture for ref, slotted, and children.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Renamed `Notifier#source` to `Notifier#subject` to align with other observable terminology and prevent name clashes with `BindingObserver` properties.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: create unified API for parsing markers
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: allow null values in attributeChangedCallback
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: feat: add splice strategies for array observation
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: handle existing shadow roots when upgrading
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix: enable safer type inference on the repeat helper
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Set prerelease version
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: separate update queue from DOM and fix architectural layers
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: aspected html directive exposes metadata
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `HTMLDirective` - The `targetIndex: number` property has been replaced by a `targetId: string` property. The `createBehavior` method no longer takes a target `Node` but instead takes a `BehaviorTargets` instance. The actual target can be looked up on the `BehaviorTargets` instance by indexing with the `targetId` property.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `compileTemplate()` - Internals have been significantly changed. The implementation no longer uses a TreeWalker. The return type has change to an `HTMLTemplateCompilationResult` with different properties.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: move template/style resolution to lazy getter
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: enable pluggable template compiler for SSR scenarios
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: enable pluggable style handling strategies
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix(fast-element): do not notify splices for changes pre-subscription
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: new directive registration/identification model
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix: prevent duplicative array observation patch
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Adds Aspect as public export
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: feat: expose official Markup and Parser APIs
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: refine binding mode types
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: add two-way binding
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix: defend against for/in use on arrays
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: fix: merge bug related to moved APIs
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: enable multiple instances of fast-element on a page at once
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: Upgrade TypeScript
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: enumerate fast-element package as a ES module package
prerelease.author: nicholasrice@users.noreply.github.com

prerelease.comment: feat: enable array length observation
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: add utilities and hooks, and change exports
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: new design for execution context
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: chore: fast-element package and build modernization
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: new CSSDirective design
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: chore: configure fast-element for internal stripping
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: enable synchronous dom updates for SSR
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: refactor: extract polyfill and polyfill-like code to an optional module
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: feat: add warn/error message infrastructure
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `View` and `HTMLView` - Type parameters added to enable strongly typed views based on their data source. The constructor of `HTMLView` has a new signature based on changes to the compiler's output. Internals have been cleaned up and no longer rely on the Range type.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com

prerelease.comment: `ElementViewTemplate`, `SyntheticViewTemplate`, and `ViewTemplate` - Added type parameters throughout. Logic to instantiate and apply behaviors moved out of the template and into the view where it can be lazily executed. Removed the ability of the `render` method to take a string id of the node to render to. You must provide a node.
prerelease.author: roeisenb@microsoft.com
